description:
Terada Miyako is asecond-year Maijima High School Academy student enrolled in Class 2-B. Miyako is a close friend of Ayumi and Chihiro. She has a long hair and freckles on her cheeks. Track-and-field club member. Her speciality are the 400m.
After the Chihiro Arc, she became a member of Chihiro`s band. Responsible for the keyboard (KORG X50).
Her name is derived from Terada Station (寺田駅, Terada-eki).
name: Terada Miyako
